title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When I set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto, Plain, or HTML in the report, it does not affect the displayed results.
EB: The report should display different results depending on the Content Type property set for the dynamic text element. For Plain, I expect the literal content (including tags) to be displayed. For Auto, I expect content 1, 2, and 3 to appear properly without HTML or RTF tags. And for HTML, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without HTML tags, while content 3 should be displayed literally with RTF tags. However, the report currently displays the same results regardless of the Content Type set. Please see the attached report for reference.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the provided report file. 
2. Locate the dynamic text element in question. 
3. Open the properties/settings for the dynamic text element. 
4. Set the Content Type property to Plain. 
5. Observe the displayed results. Repeat steps 4-5 for Auto and HTML Content Type settings.
